at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication

Class JsonInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common.communication.JsonInterface

  • final class JsonInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Here are the name of all JSON properties used in the client daemon communication.

        com.eclipsesource.json.JsonObject configurationToJSON(BufferConfiguration configuration)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Converts a "bufferConfiguration" message to a JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the buffer configuration
        Returns:
        the JSON object containing the configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the send operation fails
